resources.string:
Terms & Conditions.
1 Orders are non-refundable once prepared. 2 Prices and availability are subject to change. 3 Customers must provide accurate contact and delivery details. 4 We reserve the right to cancel or refuse orders at our discretion. 5 Users must not engage in fraudulent activities on the platform. 6 We collect necessary data for order processing and customer service. 7 These terms may be updated at any time, with notice provided in-app.
